info.headline: Tornado Watch issued March 12 at 3:02AM EST until March 12 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 42 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 6 AM EST /5 AM CST/ EARLY THIS MORNING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN ALABAMA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 1 COUNTY IN SOUTHEAST ALABAMA HOUSTON IN FLORIDA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 16 COUNTIES IN BIG BEND FLORIDA DIXIE FRANKLIN GADSDEN JEFFERSON LAFAYETTE LEON LIBERTY MADISON TAYLOR WAKULLA IN PANHANDLE FLORIDA BAY CALHOUN GULF HOLMES JACKSON WASHINGTON IN GEORGIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 25 COUNTIES IN SOUTH CENTRAL GEORGIA BEN HILL BERRIEN BROOKS COLQUITT COOK IRWIN LANIER LOWNDES THOMAS TIFT TURNER WORTH IN SOUTHWEST GEORGIA BAKER CALHOUN CLAY DECATUR DOUGHERTY EARLY GRADY LEE MILLER MITCHELL RANDOLPH SEMINOLE TERRELL THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ABBA, ABE SPRINGS, ADAMS BEACH, ADEL, ALBANY, ALFORDS, ALMA, APALACHICOLA, ARLINGTON, ASHBURN, ASHTON,
